name: Mexican Street Corn Salad
instruction: Grill the corn until charred. Mix mayonnaise, sour cream, cheese, cilantro, lime juice, and chili powder in a bowl. Cut the corn off the cob and toss with the mixture.

name: Salmon and Asparagus in Garlic Lemon Butter Sauce
instruction: Melt butter in a pan, add garlic, then salmon and asparagus. Cook until salmon is flaky. Squeeze lemon juice over and garnish with parsley.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instruction: Saut√© chicken, peppers, and onions with fajita seasoning until cooked. Serve with warm tortillas and a squeeze of lime.

name: Shrimp Avocado Salad
instruction: Cook shrimp until pink. Dice avocados, tomatoes, and red onion. Mix with shrimp, cilantro, lime juice, and olive oil.

name: Cucumber Mango Crab Salad
instruction: Dice cucumber, mango, and red onion. Mix with crab, cilantro, and lime juice.

name: Hummus Bowls
instruction: Layer hummus, sliced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese in a bowl. Serve with pita bread.

name: Avocado Tuna Salad
instruction: Mix tuna with diced avocado, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, and salt. Serve with crackers or in a wrap.

name: Ricotta Toast
instruction: Spread ricotta on toasted bread, top with sliced tomatoes, a drizzle of olive oil, and basil leaves.

name: Mediterranean Veggie Pita Sandwich
instruction: Spread hummus inside pita bread. Add sliced cucumber, tomato, red onion, and feta cheese.

name: Egg and Avocado Salad on Toast
instruction: Hard boil eggs and dice. Mix with mashed avocado, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Serve on toasted bread.
